macro.us.inflation_forecast.source_description: Blended forecast: 30% current CPI + 70% long-term target. Based on BLS CPI-U YoY and Fed long-run inflation objective.
macro.us.inflation_forecast.lookup_hint: US expected inflation rate blended from current CPI YoY and Fed 2% target

macro.us.rgdp_growth.source_description: Sum of population growth and productivity growth. BEA GDP data, Census population projections.
macro.us.rgdp_growth.lookup_hint: US expected real GDP growth rate

macro.us.tbill_forecast.source_description: Blended: 30% current 3-month T-Bill + 70% equilibrium rate. Federal Reserve data (FRED series DTB3).

macro.us.population_growth.source_description: US Census Bureau population projections. Also available via World Bank.
macro.us.population_growth.lookup_hint: Current US annual population growth rate

macro.us.productivity_growth.source_description: BLS nonfarm business sector labor productivity growth. FRED series PRS85006092.
macro.us.productivity_growth.lookup_hint: US labor productivity growth rate annual

macro.us.my_ratio.source_description: Misery index ratio. Ratio of unemployment to inflation used for equilibrium rate estimation.

macro.us.current_headline_inflation.source_description: US Bureau of Labor Statistics CPI-U YoY. Also available on FRED (series CPIAUCSL).
macro.us.current_headline_inflation.lookup_hint: Latest US CPI YoY annual rate

macro.us.long_term_inflation.source_description: Federal Reserve long-run inflation objective (PCE-based, typically 2%).

macro.us.current_tbill.source_description: US Treasury 3-month T-Bill rate. FRED series DTB3.

macro.us.country_factor.source_description: Country-specific adjustment factor for equilibrium rate estimation. US is the base (0%).
macro.us.country_factor.lookup_hint: US country factor adjustment for T-Bill equilibrium (typically 0)

macro.eurozone.inflation_forecast.source_description: Blended: 30% current HICP + 70% ECB target. Eurostat HICP data.

macro.eurozone.rgdp_growth.source_description: Eurostat GDP data, population from Eurostat demographic projections.
macro.eurozone.rgdp_growth.lookup_hint: Eurozone expected real GDP growth rate

macro.eurozone.tbill_forecast.source_description: ECB deposit facility rate and 3-month Euribor. ECB Statistical Data Warehouse.
macro.eurozone.tbill_forecast.lookup_hint: Eurozone short-term interest rate forecast (ECB deposit rate)

macro.eurozone.population_growth.source_description: Eurostat population projections for Euro area.

macro.eurozone.productivity_growth.source_description: Eurostat and OECD labor productivity data for Euro area.

macro.eurozone.current_headline_inflatio.source_description: Eurostat Harmonised Index of Consumer Prices YoY for Euro area.
macro.eurozone.current_headline_inflatio.lookup_hint: Latest Eurozone HICP YoY inflation rate

macro.eurozone.long_term_inflation.source_description: ECB inflation target (below, but close to, 2%).

macro.eurozone.current_tbill.source_description: ECB deposit facility rate or 3-month Euribor.
macro.eurozone.current_tbill.lookup_hint: Current ECB deposit facility rate or 3-month Euribor

macro.eurozone.country_factor.source_description: Country-specific adjustment for Eurozone equilibrium rate.

macro.japan.inflation_forecast.source_description: Blended: 30% current CPI + 70% BOJ target. Japan Statistics Bureau CPI.

macro.japan.rgdp_growth.source_description: Cabinet Office GDP data, National Institute of Population and Social Security Research projections.
macro.japan.rgdp_growth.lookup_hint: Japan expected real GDP growth rate

macro.japan.tbill_forecast.source_description: BOJ policy rate and Japanese Government Bond yields. Bank of Japan statistics.
macro.japan.tbill_forecast.lookup_hint: Japan short-term interest rate forecast (BOJ policy rate)

macro.japan.population_growth.source_description: Japan National Institute of Population and Social Security Research.

macro.japan.productivity_growth.source_description: Japan Productivity Center and OECD data.

macro.japan.current_headline_inflation.source_description: Japan Statistics Bureau Consumer Price Index YoY.
macro.japan.current_headline_inflation.lookup_hint: Latest Japan CPI YoY inflation rate

macro.japan.long_term_inflation.source_description: Bank of Japan price stability target (2%).

macro.japan.current_tbill.source_description: BOJ policy rate / overnight call rate. Bank of Japan statistics.
macro.japan.current_tbill.lookup_hint: Current Bank of Japan policy rate

macro.japan.country_factor.source_description: Country-specific adjustment for Japan equilibrium rate.

macro.em.inflation_forecast.source_description: Blended EM inflation. IMF World Economic Outlook, weighted average of major EM economies.

macro.em.rgdp_growth.source_description: IMF WEO EM GDP growth forecasts. Weighted average of major EM economies.
macro.em.rgdp_growth.lookup_hint: Emerging markets expected real GDP growth rate

macro.em.tbill_forecast.source_description: Weighted average of major EM policy rates. IMF, central bank data.
macro.em.tbill_forecast.lookup_hint: Emerging markets short-term interest rate forecast

macro.em.population_growth.source_description: UN Population Division, World Bank data for emerging economies.
macro.em.population_growth.lookup_hint: Emerging markets annual population growth rate

macro.em.productivity_growth.source_description: World Bank, IMF, and Conference Board Total Economy Database.
macro.em.productivity_growth.lookup_hint: Emerging markets labor productivity growth rate

macro.em.my_ratio.source_description: Misery index ratio for EM aggregate.

macro.em.current_headline_inflation.source_description: Weighted average of major EM CPI rates. IMF, Trading Economics.
macro.em.current_headline_inflation.lookup_hint: Latest emerging markets headline CPI YoY

macro.em.long_term_inflation.source_description: Weighted average of EM central bank inflation targets.
macro.em.long_term_inflation.lookup_hint: Emerging markets weighted average inflation target

macro.em.current_tbill.source_description: Weighted average of major EM policy rates (China, India, Brazil, etc.).
macro.em.current_tbill.lookup_hint: Current emerging markets weighted policy rate

macro.em.country_factor.source_description: Country-specific adjustment for EM equilibrium rate.

bonds.global.current_yield.source_description: Bloomberg Global Aggregate Index yield-to-worst, or iShares AGG ETF yield.
bonds.global.current_yield.lookup_hint: Current Bloomberg Global Aggregate Bond Index yield

bonds.global.duration.source_description: Bloomberg Global Aggregate Index modified duration.
bonds.global.duration.lookup_hint: Bloomberg Global Aggregate Bond Index duration in years

bonds.global.fair_term_premium.source_description: Estimated long-run fair value term premium for global investment-grade bonds.
bonds.global.fair_term_premium.lookup_hint: Fair value term premium for global government bonds

bonds.global.current_term_premium.source_description: Current term premium estimate. Adrian, Crump, Moench model (NY Fed) or equivalent.
bonds.global.current_term_premium.lookup_hint: Current US Treasury term premium estimate (ACM model)

bonds.hy.current_yield.source_description: ICE BofA US High Yield Index yield-to-worst. FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2EY.
bonds.hy.current_yield.lookup_hint: Current US high yield bond index yield to worst

bonds.hy.duration.source_description: ICE BofA US High Yield Index effective duration.
bonds.hy.duration.lookup_hint: US high yield bond index duration

bonds.hy.credit_spread.source_description: ICE BofA US High Yield OAS. FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2.
bonds.hy.credit_spread.lookup_hint: Current US high yield option-adjusted spread

bonds.hy.fair_credit_spread.source_description: Long-run average HY OAS. Historical median ~450-500bps.
bonds.hy.fair_credit_spread.lookup_hint: Long-term average US high yield credit spread

bonds.hy.default_rate.lookup_hint: Current US high yield trailing 12-month default rate

bonds.hy.recovery_rate.source_description: Moody's average speculative-grade recovery rate. Historical average ~40%.
bonds.hy.recovery_rate.lookup_hint: Average US high yield bond recovery rate

bonds.em.current_yield.source_description: JPMorgan EMBI Global Diversified yield. Bloomberg or JPMorgan data.
bonds.em.current_yield.lookup_hint: Current JPMorgan EMBI Global Diversified yield

bonds.em.duration.source_description: JPMorgan EMBI Global Diversified modified duration.

bonds.em.fair_term_premium.source_description: Estimated fair value term/credit premium for EM sovereign bonds.
bonds.em.fair_term_premium.lookup_hint: Fair value term premium for EM sovereign bonds

bonds.em.current_term_premium.source_description: Current EM term/spread premium estimate over risk-free.
bonds.em.current_term_premium.lookup_hint: Current EM bond spread over US Treasuries

bonds.em.default_rate.source_description: Historical EM sovereign default rate. Moody's sovereign default studies.

bonds.em.recovery_rate.source_description: Historical EM sovereign recovery rate. Moody's data, typically ~50-60%.

equity.us.dividend_yield.source_description: S&P 500 trailing dividend yield. Available from S&P, Bloomberg, multpl.com.

equity.us.current_caey.source_description: S&P 500 cyclically adjusted earnings yield (inverse of Shiller CAPE). multpl.com or RAFI.
equity.us.current_caey.lookup_hint: Current S&P 500 cyclically adjusted earnings yield (1/CAPE)

equity.us.fair_caey.source_description: Long-run average CAEY for US equities. Historical CAPE inverse average.
equity.us.fair_caey.lookup_hint: Long-term average US equity cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.us.real_eps_growth.source_description: Long-run real earnings per share growth for S&P 500. Based on GDP per capita growth.
equity.us.real_eps_growth.lookup_hint: Long-run US real earnings per share growth rate

equity.us.regional_eps_growth.source_description: Regional equity dilution/accretion adjustment. Research Affiliates methodology.
equity.us.regional_eps_growth.lookup_hint: US equity regional dilution-adjusted EPS growth

equity.us.reversion_speed.source_description: Model parameter controlling CAEY mean-reversion dampening. 100% = full reversion.
equity.us.reversion_speed.lookup_hint: Valuation reversion dampener for US equity CAEY mean reversion

equity.europe.dividend_yield.source_description: MSCI Europe dividend yield. Bloomberg, MSCI factsheets.

equity.europe.current_caey.source_description: MSCI Europe cyclically adjusted earnings yield.
equity.europe.current_caey.lookup_hint: Current MSCI Europe cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.europe.fair_caey.source_description: Long-run average CAEY for European equities.
equity.europe.fair_caey.lookup_hint: Long-term average European equity cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.europe.real_eps_growth.source_description: Long-run real EPS growth for European equities.
equity.europe.real_eps_growth.lookup_hint: Long-run European real earnings per share growth rate

equity.europe.regional_eps_growth.source_description: Regional EPS dilution/accretion adjustment for Europe.
equity.europe.regional_eps_growth.lookup_hint: European equity regional dilution-adjusted EPS growth

equity.europe.reversion_speed.source_description: Model parameter controlling CAEY mean-reversion dampening. 100% = full reversion.
equity.europe.reversion_speed.lookup_hint: Valuation reversion dampener for European equity CAEY mean reversion

equity.japan.dividend_yield.source_description: MSCI Japan or TOPIX dividend yield. Bloomberg, JPX data.

equity.japan.current_caey.source_description: MSCI Japan cyclically adjusted earnings yield.
equity.japan.current_caey.lookup_hint: Current MSCI Japan cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.japan.fair_caey.source_description: Long-run average CAEY for Japanese equities.
equity.japan.fair_caey.lookup_hint: Long-term average Japanese equity cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.japan.real_eps_growth.source_description: Long-run real EPS growth for Japanese equities.
equity.japan.real_eps_growth.lookup_hint: Long-run Japanese real earnings per share growth rate

equity.japan.regional_eps_growth.source_description: Regional EPS dilution/accretion adjustment for Japan.
equity.japan.regional_eps_growth.lookup_hint: Japanese equity regional dilution-adjusted EPS growth

equity.japan.reversion_speed.source_description: Model parameter controlling CAEY mean-reversion dampening. 100% = full reversion.
equity.japan.reversion_speed.lookup_hint: Valuation reversion dampener for Japanese equity CAEY mean reversion

equity.em.dividend_yield.source_description: MSCI Emerging Markets dividend yield. Bloomberg, MSCI factsheets.
equity.em.dividend_yield.lookup_hint: Current MSCI Emerging Markets dividend yield

equity.em.current_caey.source_description: MSCI EM cyclically adjusted earnings yield.
equity.em.current_caey.lookup_hint: Current MSCI Emerging Markets cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.em.fair_caey.source_description: Long-run average CAEY for EM equities.
equity.em.fair_caey.lookup_hint: Long-term average EM equity cyclically adjusted earnings yield

equity.em.real_eps_growth.source_description: Long-run real EPS growth for EM equities based on GDP per capita growth.
equity.em.real_eps_growth.lookup_hint: Long-run EM real earnings per share growth rate

equity.em.regional_eps_growth.source_description: Regional EPS dilution/accretion adjustment for EM.
equity.em.regional_eps_growth.lookup_hint: EM equity regional dilution-adjusted EPS growth

equity.em.reversion_speed.source_description: Model parameter controlling CAEY mean-reversion dampening. 100% = full reversion.
equity.em.reversion_speed.lookup_hint: Valuation reversion dampener for EM equity CAEY mean reversion

absolute_return.trading_alpha.source_description: Expected hedge fund alpha above factor exposures. Industry estimates.

absolute_return.beta_market.source_description: Average hedge fund market beta exposure. HFRI index analysis.
absolute_return.beta_market.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund market beta exposure

absolute_return.beta_size.source_description: Average hedge fund size factor beta. Fama-French factor analysis.
absolute_return.beta_size.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund size factor beta exposure

absolute_return.beta_value.source_description: Average hedge fund value factor beta. Fama-French factor analysis.
absolute_return.beta_value.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund value factor beta exposure

absolute_return.beta_profitability.source_description: Average hedge fund profitability factor beta. Fama-French 5-factor model.
absolute_return.beta_profitability.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund profitability factor beta exposure

absolute_return.beta_investment.source_description: Average hedge fund investment factor beta. Fama-French 5-factor model.
absolute_return.beta_investment.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund investment factor beta exposure

absolute_return.beta_momentum.source_description: Average hedge fund momentum factor beta. Carhart 4-factor model.
absolute_return.beta_momentum.lookup_hint: Average hedge fund momentum factor beta exposure

equity.us.net_buyback_yield.source_description: S&P 500 gross share buyback yield minus new equity issuance/dilution. Yardeni Research, S&P Dow Jones Indices.
equity.us.net_buyback_yield.lookup_hint: S&P 500 net share buyback yield gross buybacks minus dilution

equity.us.current_pe.source_description: S&P 500 12-month forward price-to-earnings ratio. FactSet, Yardeni Research.
equity.us.current_pe.lookup_hint: S&P 500 forward price to earnings PE ratio current

equity.us.target_pe.source_description: Long-run equilibrium forward P/E for the S&P 500. Based on historical average (~17-18x) and current structural factors.
equity.us.target_pe.lookup_hint: S&P 500 long-term average forward PE ratio equilibrium

equity.us.margin_change.source_description: Expected annual change in S&P 500 net profit margin. S&P Dow Jones Indices, FactSet.
equity.us.margin_change.lookup_hint: S&P 500 net profit margin trend forecast compression expansion

equity.us.revenue_gdp_wedge.source_description: Revenue premium of S&P 500 companies over US nominal GDP, driven by international revenue exposure (~40% for S&P 500).
equity.us.revenue_gdp_wedge.lookup_hint: S&P 500 revenue growth versus GDP growth international revenue exposure

equity.europe.net_buyback_yield.source_description: MSCI Europe net buyback yield. European buyback culture is lower than US.
equity.europe.net_buyback_yield.lookup_hint: MSCI Europe net share buyback yield

equity.europe.current_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Europe forward PE ratio current

equity.europe.target_pe.source_description: Long-run equilibrium forward P/E for European equities.
equity.europe.target_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Europe long-term average forward PE ratio

equity.europe.margin_change.source_description: Expected annual change in MSCI Europe net profit margin.
equity.europe.margin_change.lookup_hint: MSCI Europe net profit margin trend

equity.europe.revenue_gdp_wedge.source_description: Revenue premium of European equities over Eurozone nominal GDP.
equity.europe.revenue_gdp_wedge.lookup_hint: European equity revenue growth versus GDP growth

equity.japan.net_buyback_yield.source_description: MSCI Japan net buyback yield. Growing trend due to corporate governance reform.
equity.japan.net_buyback_yield.lookup_hint: MSCI Japan net share buyback yield corporate governance reform

equity.japan.current_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Japan forward PE ratio current

equity.japan.target_pe.source_description: Long-run equilibrium forward P/E for Japanese equities.
equity.japan.target_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Japan long-term average forward PE ratio

equity.japan.margin_change.source_description: Expected annual change in MSCI Japan net profit margin. Corporate governance reform driving expansion.
equity.japan.margin_change.lookup_hint: MSCI Japan net profit margin trend corporate reform

equity.japan.revenue_gdp_wedge.source_description: Revenue premium of Japanese equities over Japan nominal GDP.
equity.japan.revenue_gdp_wedge.lookup_hint: Japanese equity revenue growth versus GDP growth

equity.em.net_buyback_yield.source_description: MSCI EM net buyback yield. Typically negative due to net equity issuance/dilution.
equity.em.net_buyback_yield.lookup_hint: MSCI Emerging Markets net share buyback yield dilution

equity.em.current_pe.source_description: MSCI Emerging Markets 12-month forward P/E ratio.
equity.em.current_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Emerging Markets forward PE ratio current

equity.em.target_pe.source_description: Long-run equilibrium forward P/E for Emerging Market equities.
equity.em.target_pe.lookup_hint: MSCI Emerging Markets long-term average forward PE ratio

equity.em.margin_change.source_description: Expected annual change in MSCI EM net profit margin.
equity.em.margin_change.lookup_hint: MSCI Emerging Markets net profit margin trend

equity.em.revenue_gdp_wedge.source_description: Revenue premium of EM equities over EM aggregate nominal GDP.
equity.em.revenue_gdp_wedge.lookup_hint: Emerging Markets equity revenue growth versus GDP growth
